protocols

Class P3protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • protocols.P3protocol

  • public class P3protocol
extends java.lang.Object
    An application-level protocol for communication between notifier server and data basis servers.
    Author:
    dudu

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  P3protocol.Request
      enum to determine what do we want from DBServer
      static class  P3protocol.Site
      enum to determine if we are DBServer or N/NG Server

      • P3protocol

        public P3protocol(P3protocol.Site site,

        constructor; we fill in here addresses of servers from config object

    • Method Detail

      • talk

        public java.lang.Object talk(java.net.Socket socket,
                    P3protocol.Request request,
                    java.lang.String query,
                    BDServer bd)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The most important method. Here is implemented whole communication.
        Parameters:
        socket, - request, SQL query, connection with Data Basis on DB Server
        Returns:
        null if we are in DBServer or if error occurs. Otherwise Boolean while pinging and ResultSet while asking DB about some info.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • pingServers

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> pingServers()
        checks if DBservers are available
        Returns:
        Boolean Array of "availability"

        Parameters:
        SQL - query (String)
        Returns:
        ResultSet from DBServers
